text: Kelly Adam Asbury (January 15, 1960) was an American animated movie director, screenwriter, voice actor, published children's book author/illustrator, and non-fiction author. He was best known for directing animated movies including Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron, Shrek 2 and Gnomeo & Juliet. He was born in Beaumont, Texas. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American animators Category:American voice actors Category:American illustrators Category:American children's writers Category:Screenwriters from Texas Category:Movie directors from Texas Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Beaumont, Texas
title: Kelly Asbury
